alert.note: Alert for Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:12PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nueces and south central San Patricio Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 412 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Taft, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Portland, Sinton, Taft, Odem, Edroy, Calallen, Annaville and Taft Southwest. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 11 and 25. US Highway 181 between mile markers 624 and 632. US Highway 77 between mile markers 648 and 658. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio
